name: Bear And Bees Filagree Velvet Ribbon Brooch
description: This is a very pretty brass pendant with detailed engravings on it, I have added my artwork inside "Bee Skep Bear" and sealed it with an acrylic sealer to last. The velvet ribbon has a pin back and is a faun color, I have added a sweet little brass bee charms and lacey brass filagree to this pin treasure. Each piece comes in a clear bag attached to a description card from my studio. Looks so cute at the neckline of a shirt or worn on a vest or jacket. The size of this piece is 2 inches by 3.25 inches. For more stories about my creative works visit my blog www.greydovestudio.blogspot.com

name: Winter Woodland Walk
description:
Here is my drawing titled the Winter Woodland Walk, I was working on this while thinking of Christmas preparations, this little girl has been out in the woods looking for just the right size tree for her dolls to decorate.

To order a 8 by 11 inch size print of my work

name: The Moss Bed Velvet Ribbon Brooch
description:
Wear this delightful Victorian style brooch on jacket or dress for a beautiful original look.

The image is a reproduction of one of my original drawings, it has been laminated and attached to a setting. Then the pendant hangs from a velvety ribbon. The clasp is on the back of the ribbon.
They come beautifully packaged in a box tied with black ribbon.

The size of this brooch measures 4x2 1/2 inches

Mailed USPS first class in a bubble mailer. Please keep in mind that if you order a brooch along with prints they will be mailed separately to keep the prints from being damaged.

name: Little Grey Mouse Makes Lace
description:
This little grey mouseling is busy making a pretty lace collar, I had this idea in my mind for some time to drawing these little creators busy crafting and sewing.
The original work was done in pencil, pen and inks with a wash of watercolors. I am offering a print of my original in limited edition, printed on printmakers heavy weight textured paper, that makes the print look exactly like an original.

The image measures approx. 5" x 7" and comes with a white border for framing on a paper that is 8 by 10 inches. It is signed and dated by the artist and will come to you in a protective plastic sleeve and very sturdy packaging.

Visit my blog to read more...www.greydovestudio.blogspot.com
